@concat('DECLARE @segments	INT = ',string(pipeline().parameters.splitCount),'
DECLARE @MyCount	INT = ',string(pipeline().parameters.splitCount),'
DECLARE @myTable	TABLE(SegmentNumber INT NOT NULL, SelectText	NVARCHAR(4000))
DECLARE @ColName	NVARCHAR(150) = ''',pipeline().parameters.keyColumn,'''
DECLARE @TableName	NVARCHAR(150) = ''',pipeline().parameters.tableName,'''
DECLARE @SchemaName	NVARCHAR(150) = ''',pipeline().parameters.schemaName,'''

IF (SUBSTRING(@ColName,1,1)!=''['')
BEGIN
	SET @ColName = QUOTENAME(@ColName)
END
IF (SUBSTRING(@TableName,1,1)!=''['')
BEGIN
	SET @TableName = QUOTENAME(@TableName)
END
IF (SUBSTRING(@SchemaName,1,1)!=''['')
BEGIN
	SET @SchemaName = QUOTENAME(@SchemaName)
END

WHILE @MyCount > 0
BEGIN

DECLARE @MinId	BIGINT 
DECLARE @MaxId	BIGINT  

DECLARE @Command	NVARCHAR(400) = CONCAT(''SELECT @MinIdOut = MIN(KeyMax),  @MaxIdOut = MAX(KeyMax)FROM (SELECT '',@ColName,'' as KeyMax, NTILE('',@segments,'') OVER(ORDER BY '',@ColName,'' DESC) AS Segment FROM '',@SchemaName,''.'',@TableName,'') as test WHERE test.Segment = '',@MyCount,'''')

DECLARE @ParmDefinition NVARCHAR(500); 
SET @ParmDefinition = N''@MinIdOut BIGINT OUTPUT,   @MaxIdOut BIGINT OUTPUT'';  

EXEC SP_executesql @Command, @ParmDefinition, @MinIdOut=@MinId OUTPUT,@MaxIdOut=@MaxId OUTPUT

INSERT INTO @myTable 
	(SegmentNumber, SelectText)
VALUES
	(@MyCount, CONCAT(''SELECT ',activity('Get Column List').output.firstRow.Columns.value,' FROM '', @SchemaName ,''.'', @TableName ,'' WHERE '', @ColName ,'' BETWEEN '', @MinId, '' AND '', @MaxId))
	SET @MyCount = @MyCount-1
END
select * from @myTable

')

@concat('DECLARE @replaceSpace	BIT = ',pipeline().parameters.replaceNullInColName,'

SELECT 
	STRING_AGG (
	CASE 
	WHEN @replaceSpace = 1 THEN
	QUOTENAME(REPLACE(col.name,'' '', ''_'')) 
	ELSE
	QUOTENAME(col.name) 
	END
	, '', '') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY [column_id],sch.name, tbl.name ASC) AS [Columns]
FROM 
	sys.columns as col
INNER JOIN
	sys.tables as tbl
ON
	tbl.object_id = col.object_id
INNER JOIN
	sys.schemas as sch
ON
	tbl.schema_id = sch.schema_id
WHERE
	tbl.name = replace(replace(''',pipeline().parameters.tableName,''',''['',''''),'']'','''')
AND
	sch.name = replace(replace(''',pipeline().parameters.schemaName,''',''['',''''),'']'','''')')
